DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate whether use intraoperative ultrasound laparoscopic robotic myomectomy impact quality life . Half participant undergo laparoscopic robotic myomectomy use intraoperative ultrasound half undergo traditional laparoscopic robotic myomectomy .
DOC.brief_title: Intraoperative Ultrasound Laparoscopic Robotic Myomectomy Patients
DOC.detailed_description: In full acknowledgement correlation complete leiomyoma exeresis symptom relief , investigator hypothesize use contact ultrasonography time laparoscopic robotic myomectomy enable improve identification extraction uterine fibroid , turn , lead great improvement quality life among woman receive intraoperative ultrasound compare . In blinded randomized control trial , investigator augment traditional laparoscopic robotic myomectomy intraoperative ultrasound half symptomatic patient enrol study . The half randomized undergo laparoscopic robotic myomectomy without use intra-operative ultrasound . Both group complete Uterine Fibroid Symptom Quality Life ( UFS- QOL ) questionnaires surgery ( 6 month post procedure ) determine whether use laparoscopic contact ultrasonography positive impact patient ' quality life .

If deem necessary provider , must pelvic MRI prior surgery state concern finding malignancy 5 .
